biography.bio: Esperanza Roy was born on November 22, 1935 in Madrid, Spain as Esperanza Fuentes Roy. She is an actress, known for Return of the Evil Dead (1973), Vida/Perra (1982) and Vete de mí (2006).
biography.name: Esperanza Roy

biography.bio: Quique Camoiras was born on November 7, 1928 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Enrique Pérez Camoiras. He was an actor and director, known for La corte de Faraón (1985), Tú estás loco Briones (1981) and National Adultery (1982). He died on March 2, 2012 in Madrid.
biography.name: Quique Camoiras

biography.bio: Aurora Redondo was born on January 1, 1900 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Aurora Redondo Pérez. She was an actress, known for Les bicyclettes sont pour l'été (1984), Ninette y un señor de Murcia (1965) and Yo soy ésa (1990). She was married to Valeriano León García. She died on July 10, 1996 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Aurora Redondo

biography.bio: José Orjas was born on February 26, 1906 in Madrid, Spain as José Orejas González. He was an actor, known for Le bourreau (1963), Los pajaritos (1974) and Atraco a las tres (1962). He was married to Concha Sancha Cobo. He died on December 16, 1983 in Madrid.
biography.name: José Orjas

biography.bio: Luis Varela was born on January 11, 1943 in Madrid, Spain. He is an actor, known for El Crimen Perfecto (The Perfect Crime) (2004), À la carte (2008) and The Last Circus (2010). He was previously married to Magdalena Durán.
biography.name: Luis Varela

biography.bio: María Kosty was born on April 29, 1951 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as María Soledad Mesa Pachón. She is an actress, known for Lalola (2008), Planta 25 (2006) and Géminis, venganza de amor (2002).
biography.name: María Kosty

biography.birthName: María de la Encarnación Paso Ramos
biography.bio: Encarna Paso was born on March 25, 1931 in Madrid, Spain as María de la Encarnación Paso Ramos. She is an actress, known for Volver a empezar (1982), Démons dans le jardin (1982) and La forêt animée (1987).
biography.name: Encarna Paso

biography.bio: Ángel de Andrés was born on May 25, 1918 in Madrid, Spain as Angel de Andrés Miquel. He was an actor and writer, known for Esquilache (1989), Historias de la radio (1955) and El hincha (1958). He was married to Conchita Juárez. He died on August 5, 2006 in Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Ángel de Andrés

biography.bio: David Allar is an actor, known for Secuestro a la española (1972).
biography.name: David Allar

biography.bio: Ángel Álvarez was born on September 26, 1906 in Madrid, Spain as Ángel Alvarez Fernández. He was an actor and writer, known for Django (1966), Le bourreau (1963) and The Little Apartment (1959). He died on December 13, 1983 in Madrid.
biography.name: Ángel Álvarez

biography.bio: Félix Dafauce was born on November 13, 1896 in Madrid, Spain as Félix Dafauce Tarancón. He was an actor, known for Déracinés (1951), Red Fish (1955) and Novela (1963). He died on October 5, 1990 in Madrid.
biography.name: Félix Dafauce

biography.placeOfBirth: Valladolid, Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain
biography.bio: Emilio Laguna was born on May 13, 1930 in Valladolid, Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain as Emilio Laguna Salcedo. He is an actor and writer, known for No te rías, que es peor (1990), Sonría, por favor (1996) and Watch Out, We're Mad (1974).
biography.name: Emilio Laguna

biography.bio: Teresa Hurtado was born on July 17, 1949. She is an actress, known for Un, dos, tres... responda otra vez (1972), The House That Screamed (1970) and I premios Goya (1987).
biography.name: Teresa Hurtado

biography.bio: Tota Alba was born on March 5, 1914 in Buenos Aires, Argentina as Dolores Bejarano Alba. She was an actress, known for Strange Voyage (1964), El chiste (1976) and Une femme est passée... (1965). She died in 1983 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Tota Alba

biography.bio: Lorenzo Robledo was born in 1921. He was an actor, known for The Good, the Bad and the Ugly (1966), For a Few Dollars More (1965) and The Mercenary (1968). He died in September 2006 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Lorenzo Robledo
